post:
Hi Folks,

June bundle, available for 7 days only.


Get a VPS in all 5 Inception hosting Locations €10.00 p/year **total**!


<img src="https://i.imgur.com/E5Xeumi.png" />


Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&bid=11


When ordering it will display Japan first, fill in the details and click continue, it will take you though each location to enter a host name & root password.


You can enable TUN, FUSE, NFS yourself on demand.

Quick terms TL;DR

* No TOR
* No Torrents
* No crypto mining
* 30% of a core avg over 24 hour period FUP on CPU or 60% for up to 1 hour.


Cheers!


Ant.
